code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReserveAlert=()=>{const[reserveKm,setReserveKm]=useState("");const[alertTime,setAlertTime]=useState("6");const handleSave=()=>{localStorage.setItem("reserveKm",reserveKm);localStorage.setItem("alertTime",alertTime);alert("âœ… Reserve alert saved!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83D\uDD14 Reserve Details & Alert"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Reserve Kilometers",value:reserveKm,onChange:e=>setReserveKm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Alert me after: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:alertTime,onChange:e=>setAlertTime(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"6",children:"6 hrs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"12",children:"12 hrs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"24",children:"24 hrs"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,children:"Save Reserve Alert"})]});};export default ReserveAlert;
